name: untravelled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having visited many different places: It can't be easy being an untravelled American in Paris. I was a normal eighteen-year-old: self-conscious, untravelled, and inexperienced.
not visited by many people: We drove from Norcia to Foligno on the pretty but virtually untravelled backroads. In the early days, the website was largely untravelled.
More examplesFewer examplesAmong the untravelled masses, these fantastical stories remained dominant for more than a century.The ordinary untravelled European, on first arriving in India, may experience an initial culture shock.He found several new species in the relatively untravelled ground of Africa and South America.
